record.name: PDA Bundle
record.description: Provides employees with a complete mobility solution supported by iPaq PDA technology.
record.detailedDescription:
Provides employees with a complete mobility solution supported by iPaq PDA technology. The PDA is supported by complete synchronization with your Outlook accounts, including email and calendar.
Optional phone service is available in some regions. International roaming support is available for employees with proper business justification and special manager approval.
record.options: <form><label id="opt1">(1) iPaq</label><label id="opt2">(1) Mobile Phone Service</label></form>
record.optionsAlias: <form><label id="opt1">(1) iPaq</label><label id="opt2">(1) Mobile Phone Service</label></form>
